original_text:
Alpha Eagle Stack N Sync
Simbolo degli Stati Uniti dal 1782, l’aquila testa bianca è uno dei rapaci più grandi d’America, di sicuro il più elegante. Vive tra le montagne e caccia pesci, sopratutto salmoni; perciò, è possibile avvistarlo vicino a laghi e fiumi. La software house Hacksaw Gaming ha voluto dedicare una slot a questo splendido animale ricreando come sfondo montagne innevate che possono essere ammirate sull’intero schermo grazia alla griglia di gioco trasparente. La grafica delle icone è veramente bella, con i simboli scolpiti nelle pietra e la scelta di colori freddi che in questo periodo invernale aiutano ad entrare ancor di più nell’atmosfera del gioco. La musica che accompagna gli Spin è un motivetto composto con una tastiera, dal tipico sound anni Ottanta.
Un ottimo RTP
Le 20 linee di pagamento fisse sono disposte su una griglia a 5 rulli e 4 righe su cui è possibile puntare un minimo di 0,10 € e un massimo di 100 €. I giri automatici ci permettono di giocare senza doverci preoccupar dei cliccare ogni volta sul tasto Play, mentre accedendo al menù interno è possibile azionare la funzione Turbo per velocizzare la rotazione dei rulli.
Per vincere è necessario associare da tre a cinque simboli identici partendo dal rullo di sinistra verso destra.
La volatilità è alta, il dato RTP è invece pari al 96,26%.
Un sistema di bonus interessante
Come accade sempre, i simboli che pagano meno di tutti sono le carte da gioco che servono a comporre una scala reale, dal dieci all’asso. Per vincite più alte ci sono i simboli tematici, come le piume, il salmone, il guado, l’uovo e la testa dell’aquila. Tra i simboli speciali troviamo il Wild, che oltre a sostituire tutti i simboli eccolo quelli bonus, se ne atterrano cinque paga quanto la testa di aquila. Il nido con la scritta S’N’S è un altro simbolo speciale. In tal caso, l’intero rullo in cui è comparsa la scritta viene trasformato in simbolo casuale e parte un Respin. A poter essere impilati non sono solo i simboli base, ma anche lo Scatter, che vedremo a breve, e il Wild. Esiste una versione dorata del simbolo S’N’S, vengono impilati tutti i rulli della griglia con Wild o Scatter. Inoltre, questo simbolo attiva un moltiplicatore da 2x sino a un massimo di 100x.
Abbiamo poi due Scatter, il primo è rappresentato dalla scritta FS e assegna tanti Free Spins quanti sono gli Scatter. Il secondo Scatter, gli artigli dell’aquila, attiva un gioco speciale in cui compaiono solo simboli aquila e aquila dorata. Si hanno tre resini durante i quali tutti i simboli aquila rimangono appiccicati sui rulli. Nella seconda fase, tutti i simboli aquila e aquila dorata vengono collegati e pagati.
Queste funzioni sono anche acquistabili attraverso il tasto Bonus.
 
Domande Frequenti 
Quanti simboli Bonus sono presenti in Alpha Eagle Stack’n’Sinch?

In questa slot abbiamo cinque Bonus: Il Wild, il simbolo FS, due versioni del simbolo S’N’S e gli artigli del rapace.



A quanto corrisponde il ritorno teorico al giocatore?

In Alpha Eagle Stack’n’Sinch il valore RTP si attesta sul 96,26%.



A quanto ammonta puntata minima e la massima?

Si parte da 0,20 € per ogni Spin sino a un massimo di 100 €.

raw_translation.response:
Alpha Eagle Stack N Sync
The bald eagle, a symbol of the United States since 1782, is one of America's largest and most elegant birds of prey. Hacksaw Gaming, the software house, has paid tribute to this magnificent creature by creating a slot with a backdrop of snow-capped mountains that can be admired on the entire screen thanks to the transparent game grid. The icons' graphics are truly stunning, with the symbols carved in stone and the choice of cold colors that help immerse players even more in the game's atmosphere during this winter period. The music that accompanies spins is a tune composed with a keyboard with a typical 80s sound.

An excellent RTP
The 20 fixed paylines are arranged on a 5x4 reel grid on which you can bet a minimum of €0.10 and a maximum of €100. Automatic spins enable us to play without having to worry about clicking the Play button each time, while accessing the internal menu allows us to activate the Turbo function to increase the reel rotation speed. To win, you need to match three to five identical symbols starting from the leftmost reel.

The volatility is high, and the RTP is at 96.26%.

An interesting bonus system
As always, the symbols that pay the least are the playing cards that make up a royal straight flush, from ten to ace. For higher payouts, there are themed symbols such as feathers, salmon, fords, eggs, and the eagle's head. Special symbols include the Wild, which substitutes all symbols except bonus ones, and if five appear on a payline, they pay as much as the eagle's head. The nest with the S'N'S inscription is another special symbol. In this case, the entire reel where the S'N'S inscription has appeared is transformed into a random symbol, and a respin initiates. Not only base symbols, but also the Scatter, which we will see shortly, and the Wild can be stacked. There is also a golden version of the S'N'S symbol where all the grid's reels are stacked with Wild or Scatter. This symbol also activates a multiplier from 2x up to a maximum of 100x.

We then have two Scatters, the first represented by the inscription FS, which assigns as many Free Spins as there are Scatters. The second Scatter, the eagle's claws, activates a special game where only eagle and golden eagle symbols appear. Three respins are available during which all eagle symbols remain sticky on the reels. In the second phase, all eagle and golden eagle symbols are connected and paid.

These functions are also purchasable through the Bonus button.

FAQ

How many Bonus symbols are there in Alpha Eagle Stack N Sync?

Five Bonus symbols are available in this slot: Wild, FS symbol, two versions of the S'N'S symbol, and the bird of prey's claws.

What is the theoretical return to player value?

In Alpha Eagle Stack N Sync, the RTP value is 96.26%.

What is the minimum and maximum bet amount?

The minimum bet amount is €0.20 per spin, and the maximum is €100.

Review:
 
Game Design and Visuals

The Alpha Eagle Stack N Sync slot features a snowy mountain background with a transparent game grid that allows complete immersion in the game. The icons' graphics are beautifully designed, with symbols carved in stone and cool colors enhancing the winter theme. The music is a catchy keyboard tune that complements the game's atmosphere and reminiscent of the sound of the 80s.

Paylines and Volatility

The game has a layout of 5 reels, 4 rows, and 20 fixed paylines, where players can bet a minimum of €0.10 and maximum of €100. Alpha Eagle Stack N Sync has a high volatility rate, which makes the game more exciting and offers a chance to win big. Additionally, the game boasts an excellent RTP percentage of 96.26%.

Bonus Symbol System

This slot has five bonus symbols that include two versions of S'N'S scatter, Wild, FS, and bird of prey's talons. While the Wild acts as a substitute for all other symbols except the bonus ones, the nest with the S'N'S writing appearing on the reel transforms the entire reel into a random symbol with a Respin. The Scatter symbols can stack, and there are two: the FS symbol that triggers Free Spins and the talons that activate a special game with all eagle and golden eagle symbols appearing for three respins. These features can also be purchased through the Bonus Buy button.

Special Features

Alpha Eagle Stack N Sync's special features include a golden version of the S'N'S symbol which can stack all the grid reels with Wild or Scatter and activate a multiplier of up to 100x. The Wild is the highest paying symbol that can reward players with as much as the eagle head when five land on the reels. The Scatter can also stack during the game.

Overall Experience and Recommendation

Alpha Eagle Stack N Sync is a slot game with stunning graphics and an exciting theme that complements the winter season. The game boasts excellent features like the bonus system, special features, Free Spins, Respins, and scatters. The high volatility rate and an RTP of 96.26% add to the excitement of playing, and the various betting options accommodate players of different levels. Overall, Alpha Eagle Stack N Sync is a highly recommended game for slot enthusiasts looking for a new and exciting experience.

Review: Alpha Eagle Stack N Sync

The majestic bald eagle, a symbol of the United States since 1782, is one of America's largest birds of prey and certainly the most elegant. It lives in the mountains and hunts fish, especially salmon; therefore, it is possible to spot it near lakes and rivers. The software company Hacksaw Gaming has dedicated a slot to this beautiful animal, creating a background of snowy mountains that can be admired on the entire screen thanks to the transparent game grid. The graphics of the icons are truly beautiful, with symbols carved into stone and the choice of cool colors that help you dive even deeper into the game's atmosphere during this winter period. The music that accompanies the spins is a catchy tune composed with a keyboard, reminiscent of the typical sound of the 80s.

An excellent RTP
The 20 fixed paylines are arranged on a grid of 5 reels and 4 rows on which you can bet a minimum of €0.10 and a maximum of €100. Automatic spins allow us to play without having to worry about clicking the Play button every time, while accessing the internal menu allows you to activate the Turbo function to speed up the rotation of the reels. To win, you must match three to five identical symbols starting from the leftmost reel towards the right.

The volatility is high, while the RTP percentage is 96.26%.

An interesting bonus system
As often happens, the symbols that pay the least are the playing cards that make up a royal flush, from ten to ace. For higher winnings, there are thematic symbols such as feathers, salmon, ford, egg, and eagle head. Among the special symbols, we find the Wild, which not only replaces all symbols except for bonus ones but also pays as much as the eagle head when five Wilds land. The nest with the S'N'S writing is another special symbol. In this case, the entire reel where the writing appeared is transformed into a random symbol, and a Respin is triggered. Not only basic symbols but also the Scatter can be stacked, which we will see shortly, and the Wild. There is a golden version of the S'N'S symbol, where all the grid reels can be stacked with Wild or Scatter. In addition, this symbol activates a multiplier from 2x up to a maximum of 100x.

We then have two Scatters: the first is represented by the FS writing and assigns as many Free Spins as there are Scatters. The second Scatter, the eagle's talons, activates a special game where only eagle symbols and golden eagle symbols appear. There are three respins during which all eagle symbols stick to the reels. In the second phase, all eagle and golden eagle symbols are linked and paid.

These features can also be purchased through the Bonus button.

Frequently Asked Questions

How many bonus symbols are present in Alpha Eagle Stack N Sync?

In this slot, we have five bonuses: the Wild, the FS symbol, two versions of the S'N'S symbol, and the bird of prey's talons.

What is the theoretical return to player rate?

In Alpha Eagle Stack N Sync, the RTP value is 96.26%.

What are the minimum and maximum bets?

You can start with €0.20 per spin up to a maximum of €100.
